text: Seyyed Razi Metro Station is a station of Mashhad Metro Line 1. The station opened on 10 October 2011. It is located on Vakilabad Expressway. The station provides access to Farabi Hospital. ==References== Category:Mashhad Metro stations Category:Railway stations opened in 2011 Category:2011 establishments in Iran
title: Kowsar Metro Station (Mashhad Metro)
